General.Name: Beijing Science Sun Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Science Sun Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of injections in China. It offers products for cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, immunomodulatory, nervous systems, and other areas. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

4.Name: Mr. Xue Feng  Wang
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
